headerText: The `v-input` component gives you a baseline to create your own custom inputs. It consists of a prepend/append slot, messages, and a default slot. It is _recommended_ that you extend this component, but it can be used as a standalone.

usage.desc: `v-input` has 4 main areas. The prepended slot, the appended slot, the default slot, and messages. These make up the core logic shared between all form components.

props.appendIcon: Appends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.appendIconCb: Callback for appended icon when clicked
props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color of the input
props.label: Sets input label
props.persistentHint: Forces hint to always be visible
props.prependIcon: Prepends an icon to the component, uses the same syntax as `v-icon`
props.prependIconCb: Callback for prepended icon when clicked
props.required: Designates the input as required; Adds an asertisk to the end of the label; Does not perform any validation.
props.toggleKeys: Array of key codes that will toggle the input (if it supports toggling)

events.blur: Emitted when the input is blurred
events.change: Emitted when the input is changed by user interaction
events.click:append: Emitted when appended icon is clicked
events.click:prepend: Emitted when prepended icon is clicked
